column1: Did sumerman always fly?;No;The original comic book Superman could only leap tall buildings in a single bound.
The First Computer Was Invented in the 1940s;Yes; in 1946 ENIAC weighed 60 000 pounds and took up a room larger than most studio apartments (1 500 square feet).

The Loch Ness is the national animal of Scotland;No; While Scotland proudly boasts the Loch Ness Monster one of the world?àôs most famous fabled creatures  the country opted to make another mythical beast its national animal: the unicorn.
Do bees sometimes sting other bees?;Yes;In protecting their hives from outsiders some ?à?guard bees?àù will stay by the entrance and sniff the bees that come in.
